summary: This document outlines the TBMA/ISMA Global Master Repurchase Agreement between Deutsche Bank AG and Southern Financial LLC, detailing the terms and conditions for repurchase transactions, including definitions, obligations, and procedures for margin maintenance, income payments, and events of default. It includes supplemental terms for various types of transactions, including those involving equities and Italian bonds.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the principal for Southern Financial LLC in the agreement.

persons.name: Brettli
persons.context: Brettli is mentioned as the president of Deutsche Bank AG, signing the agreement.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein, as the principal of Southern Financial LLC, is entering into a financial agreement with Deutsche Bank AG.

events.title: Global Master Repurchase Agreement
events.description: The agreement between Deutsche Bank AG and Southern Financial LLC is established, outlining the terms for repurchase transactions.

keyFacts: The agreement is dated January 7, 2015, between Deutsche Bank AG and Southern Financial LLC.
Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the principal of Southern Financial LLC.
The document outlines terms for repurchase transactions, including margin maintenance and income payments.
It includes supplemental terms for transactions involving equities and Italian bonds.
Brettli, as president of Deutsche Bank AG, is a signatory to the agreement.
